recipe.recipe_name: Grilled Lemon-Herb Chicken and Veggie Kabobs
recipe.ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces, 2 zucchinis, cut into 1-inch slices, 2 bell peppers, any color, cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 large red onion, cut into 1-inch pieces, 2 tablespoons olive oil, Juice of 1 lemon, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary, Salt and pepper, to taste, Fresh parsley, chopped for garnish, Lemon wedges, to serve
recipe.directions: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Place the chicken pieces in a bowl and pour half of the marinade over the chicken. Toss to coat and let it marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes. Reserve the remaining marinade for vegetables, Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread the marinated chicken, zucchini, bell peppers, and red onion onto skewers, alternating chicken and vegetables. Brush the vegetable parts of the skewers with the reserved marinade, Place the skewers on the grill and cook for approximately 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender and lightly charred, Remove from grill, sprinkle with chopped parsley, and serve with lemon wedges on the side.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 260, Total fat 9g, Protein 27g, Cholesterol 65mg, Total carbohydrate 15g, Dietary fiber 3g, Monounsaturated fat 5g, Saturated fat 1.5g, Added sugars 0g, Sodium 75mg, Trans fat 0g, Potassium 650mg, Total sugars 5g
